attributes.title: Sold my info to Russia
attributes.review: Not even 10 minutes after I downloaded the app I started getting calls from companies in Russia! All day and night.... this app 100% sold my information to Russia. Stop worrying about TikTok... it’s the app that doesn’t even hide that they monitor everything you do and show it to Russia who you need to worry about.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.review: This is a terrible app my phone was in top condition before downloading this app after I downloaded this app my phone began glitching and kicking me out of the app, after downloading this app I realized how terrible it was even though I was very excited to support our dear pig I mean President. Please take this off the App Store so other users don’t get mislead like I did😡😡😡

attributes.title: TERRIFYING IMAGES
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because it was recommended to me by some coworkers in order to keep up with the greatest leader known to man kind (similar to hitler) but instead there were terrifying images of an old man shaped like a house and the color of a cheeto! it was so horrific that i literally had to bleach my eyes in order to unsee that disgusting pig-like sight! i do not recommend this app at all!

attributes.title: ✨HORRIBLE👿APP🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.review: I downloaded🎉 this app and I had a heart attack because🧚🏼‍♂️ as soon ✨as I opened💐 it I was a Cheeto clown with a cows ball sack and it was just so scary but that’s not even 🧚🏼‍♂️the worst part the clowns wig 🤪came to my house and TOOK... MY.🎉... TOES then Damon Salvatore and Elena Gilbert came😌 to my house with ✨the Cheeto puff and 🌺had a twerking 💕competition with my oven and of course my oven won 👿but the clown said that he was going to depart my oven🥺🥺👁👄👁

attributes.title: HATE THIS APP! DONT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: This app ruined my life😾 this app deserves to be off the AppStore, it kept telling me about Donald trump like why do I care about that 🍊??? He does nothing good for the world like why do I want to know about him😡 Ugh i just wanted a fUn GaMe!! Anyways bernie 2020:)) OH and if trump is reading this, you dropped this 🔴 put it back on ur nose🥰🧚‍♀️✨😹 LOL clown😻 okay so take this off the AppStore please and thanks - not sincerely the kpop stan😽

attributes.title: horrible, despicable, awful.
attributes.review: absolutely horrible app. it told me multiple times to leave the country and go back to where i came from. also tried to build a wall between me and my phone and it made me incredibly upset! also, as i am a woman, it tried controlling what i can and cannot do with my body! absolutely disgusting. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. (IF YOU DO BE SURE TO RATE IT 1 STAR LIKE IT DESERVES!

attributes.title: This app is trash never again
attributes.review: My phone was perfectly fine until I downloaded this app my phone kept led turning off and I could barely use my other apps I advise you not to use this app at all it’s trash and a waste of time my phone was glitching and I thought somebody was tracking me while using the app

attributes.title: BROKE MY PHONE
attributes.review: do not download this app!!!! I just bought a brand new phone last week and literally as soon as i downloaded this app my phone started to glitch and had now completely shut off. I now have to write this on my computer. now i have to spend even more money and buy a completely new phone :(

attributes.title: HORRENDOUS DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: After I purchased this app I opened it to see the appalling image of the Tangerine Twister in a suit.🍊The app title and cover are very misleading as I did not know it would contain information about fruit. It also glitches horribly due to the fact that there is too much false information for the software to handle. ⚠️Do not download may corrupt your phone with lies!!⚠️

attributes.title: DON’T RECOMMEND
attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app there was a troll, who said he lived under a bridge, asked me a riddle to see if I could even use it. After that whole nonsense this guy tried to swipe all of my information and give it to Russia! If you want to put up with all of this then go right ahead and download it but I thought it was a waste of my time.
